definition: meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 总部基地在全球选择合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: Jack was one of his old compatriots.
sentences.chinese: 杰克是他的老伙伴之一。

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上干活的木匠将斧子传给下面的伙伴。

sentences.english: Fang is Hagrid's pet and companion.
sentences.chinese: 牙牙是海格的宠物，也是伙伴。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其实，以企业为主导的社会伙伴关系面对种种的限制。

sentences.english: People survive because they are really good cooperators.
sentences.chinese: 人们进化是因为他们彼此间是最好的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Pakistan is an important neighbor and strategic cooperative partner of China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦是中国的重要邻国和战略合作伙伴。

sentences.english: The mission of this army colonel and his two fellow taikonauts will last about 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这位上校和他的两位航天员伙伴持续40分钟的任务。

sentences.english: Good price will be for creditable business partner.
sentences.chinese: 好价格将是可信的商业合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Hal is a business genius and had reached the top of the tree before he was twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢同哈尔一起出去，因为他是一个很有趣的伙伴。

sentences.english: These ties among our people are the life blood of our emerging partnership.
sentences.chinese: 我们人民之间的纽带是我们新兴伙伴关系的生命力。

sentences.english: We are very proud of our partnership with Huaxin.
sentences.chinese: 与华新的合作伙伴关系使我们深感自豪。

sentences.english: It has teamed up with several partners to develop its Google TV platform.
sentences.chinese: 它已经和其他几个伙伴合作起来开发谷歌电视平台。

sentences.english: You should have at least two partners.
sentences.chinese: 你至少需要两个伙伴一起活动。

sentences.english: Over the years, Zhang Shuang has become a close friend to many of the children.
sentences.chinese: 这些年来，张爽早已成为孩子们的好伙伴。

sentences.english: When I saw that my partner was just bein' friendly.
sentences.chinese: 当我看见我的伙伴不过是有点友善。

definition: person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to team up (with)/to put a team together
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
